goals__remit: Telenet specialises in the supply of broadband internet, fixed telephony services and cable television, including content services, to customers throughout Flanders and a part of Brussels over a powerful HFC (hybrid fibre-coax) network.  It also offers mobile services on the entire territory of Belgium. In this respect it  acquired BASE, a mobile network operator. Telenet also supplies professional communication services to businesses in Belgium and Luxembourg. Liberty Global is the main shareholder of Telenet.
